title: Se7en
short_description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: V for vendetta
short_description: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of 'V', plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

title: The prestige
short_description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.
